item.title: HackTheBox Pwn: Toxin
item.description: This challenge on the HackTheBox was released recently, the archive attachment contains the following files: toxin: The binary ld-2.27.so and the libc-2.27 file. The given LIBC files hinted towards the binary running on the Ubuntu 18.
